div.p: Should study abroad be a compulsory part of education? Explain your point of view.

I don't think it should be an obligation to leave our country to another one, we've got all what we need to learn a foreign language. When I was in High School, we learned some experiences did by several scientists, and those were in English; I did love that.
However, It will be beneficial to spend some weeks in a country where the spoken mother tongue is the tongue we want to learn. I would like to go in England for instance, that would be awesome.
Actually, I like to think that my English level is basic, and I know if I go in an other country, where the people who speak english, my English level would be will increase.
To conclude, Leave our country for another one to increase our language level should be advise, but not compulsory.
